speakers.name: Sam Hallene
speakers.bio: Sam Hallene is an Investment Partner at CMT Digital. Sam joined the CMT Digital venture group at its inception in 2017 and focuses on thesis formation, deal sourcing, and ongoing portfolio relations. He graduated from the University of Michigan with a double major in Economics and Spanish.
